title: Provide Unaccompanied Minor (UM) Rules
description: A parent is asking about the rules and fees for their child to fly alone as an unaccompanied minor.

tasks.description: Retrieve the airline's official policy for unaccompanied minors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct policy document.

tasks.description: Explain the age restrictions, eligible flights (e.g., no connections), and the UM service fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains all rules and fees.

tasks.description: Explain the drop-off and pick-up procedures, including the requirement for the designated adults to show ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a comprehensive overview of the process.
